product_name: Charlotte TilburyLife Changing Lip Mask with Cushioning Ceramides
summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's lusciously, hydrating Life Changing Lip Mask with Cushioning Ceramides melts into lips to deeply nourish, plump & restore creating a cashmere-soft canvas for effortless lipstick application.
details: DetailsBenefitsEncased in a collectable, quilted pack in two glowing shades: pink vanilla and clear unscented.Clinically proven to plump, lift, hydrate, and smooth the appearance of lips immediately and over time.Key IngredientsLip Lift Technology: Boosts the appereance of lip volume, plumpness, and definitionCushioning Ceramides: for long lasting hydration and barrier supportBarrier-Boosting Botanical Butters: soften, soothe, & defends lips with every applicationResearch ResultsPlumps the look of lips by 45% in just 28 days*Lips are instantly 170% more hydrated**Reduces the look of lip lines by 58% in just 28 days*Strengthens the lip barrier in just 28 seconds***Independent clinical trial tested on over 30 people applied 3x per day**Independent clinical trial tested on over 30 peopleItem 2644536How To UseMagic Application: apply a generous, even layer of charlotte's life changing lip mask onto clean, dry lips. Use for hydration on the go throughout the day, or as an overnight lip mask.Makeup Prep: leave the lip mask on for 10 minutes, then wipe off any remaining product. Resize and reshape the look of lips with Charlotte's Lip Cheat Lip Liner (sold separately), then apply your choice of lipstick!IngredientsPillow Talk: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Glyceryl Behenate, Synthetic Wax, Glyceryl Stearate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Ceramide Np, Irvingia Gabonensis (Oba) Kernel Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dipropylene Glycol, Benzotriazolyl Dodecyl P-Cresol, Tribehenin, Potassium Stearate, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Lactic Acid, Aroma (Flavor), Benzyl Benzoate, Vanillin, Alumina. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Magic Application: apply a generous, even layer of charlotte's life changing lip mask onto clean, dry lips. Use for hydration on the go throughout the day, or as an overnight lip mask.Makeup Prep: leave the lip mask on for 10 minutes, then wipe off any remaining product. Resize and reshape the look of lips with Charlotte's Lip Cheat Lip Liner (sold separately), then apply your choice of lipstick!

reviews.headline: Kissable lips
reviews.comments:
I received this product in exchange for my honest review. Charlotte Tilbury products are always a hit for me! Their pillow talk lip mask is wonderful. It comes in a decent sized pot with a quilted "pillow" top. There's a very light vanilla scent.
It immediately made my lips look and feel kissable. They looked and felt more plump after just a few uses! I also noticed that my lips stopped peeling nearly as much. I'd highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Gorgeous!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This lip mask is absolutely lush and darling. Will it plump your lips? If you're not already going to bed with your lips slathered in lip product, then yes. If this is already part of your routine you'll probably only notice a small benefit of plumping. I do think it sits on the lips well and is very hydrating. The scent is lovely and the packaging looks gorgeous on my nightstand. I think for those factors alone, the product is worth the price.

reviews.headline: Truly Magical!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The Charlotte Tillbury magic lip mask is truly magical. Not only is the packaging absolutely gorgeous and super chic, but it also works wonders for your lips. 

I've used lip masks in the past, but I've never achieved the results I have now. 

It's smells amazing and it works like a charm. 
It instantly blurred my fine lines and added a nice touch of hydration! My lips look a lot fuller than they used to, which is a bonus. 

I've officially incorporated this lip mask into my nightly skincare routine, and every morning, I wake up to find my lips softer than ever before. This lip mask is definitely one of my favorites and I will definitely keep this a part of my routine.

reviews.headline: Super hydrating
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a great lip mask. My lips looked amazing and felt super hydrated. There is a nice subtle pink tint and a pleasant vanilla scent. I didn't notice a noticeable plumping affect but overall I am very happy with this lip mask. My lips felt smooth for hours.

reviews.headline: Pillowtalk Perfection!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I absolutely love Charlotte Tilbury brand, so I was super excited to try the Pillowtalk Life Changing Lip Maskâ€”and it didn't disappoint! After using it once or twice, my lips felt instantly plump, hydrated, and so smooth. The adorable quilted packaging makes it even more special and luxe. I'm already obsessed with how pampering this lip mask feels!!

reviews.headline: Very hydrating
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Very hydrating easy to apply it actually is very lightweight. It's not very thick at all. It definitely hydrate very well too and it's moisturizing. I'd like the package. It's very cute. It's very fancy. There's no scent to it The ingredients are perfect. It's very gentle to put on an hydrating.

reviews.headline: In love
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] My lips have never felt or looked better since using this. The cute little pillow like top really makes me want to use this and keep it on display. Small enough to take on the go and wear as a daily lip treatment or as an overnight mask, either way the results are amazing. The vanilla scent isn't too overwhelming and I like that, the color of the mask itself fits well with the light pink colored packaging that only ms Tilbury can do. I received this product for free.

reviews.headline: So hydrating
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Oh my lips felt so good after using this lip mask! It's so hydrating and it actually has a nice taste! My lips feel smoother too! The packaging is absolutely elegant and looks like it's cost 200.00!

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review]

5 stars this is a slam dunk! I love it so so much!!!! The way it made me skin feel is unreal. Run and get this! You will fall in love almost instantly. Such a good brand too! Obbbbssed! !!!!

reviews.headline: Life changing? Not necessarily.
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I wouldn't say this is a life changing lip mask, but did it moisturize my lips? Yes. Did the moisturizing effects last? Yes. The scent isn't my favorite. It smells good but has a slight off setting smell at the same time. The packaging is cute and luxurious looking as all CT are.

reviews.headline: Lips
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This is cutest lip product I've ever seen. Has a great scent, so perfect texture, keep lips smooth and beautiful.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] BEAUTIFUL packaging. It's worth it on that alone. Makes me feel so girly having it in my bag. The actual product is amazing, too. Feels so luxurious. Has a very light scent. Won't upset anyone who is sensitive to scents. Makes my lips moisturized and healthy.

reviews.headline: Keeps lips soft, hydrated, and pampered.
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This lip mask feels very nourishing and instantly smooths dry lips. It has a nice, light texture that isn't sticky and leaves a soft sheen. Perfect for both overnight care and a little daytime glow

reviews.headline: A must have in yourpurse,bathroom and car.
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This lusciously, hydrating mask melts into lips to deeply nourish, plump & restore creating a cashmere-soft canvas for effortless lipstick application.Clinically proven to plump, lift, hydrate, and smooth the appearance of lips immediately and over time. What I love about this lip mask it's Vegan and cruelty-free Free of parabens, formaldehydes, and phthalates, and it boosts the appearance giving you that fuller lip.not to mention the lip mask  encased into a beautiful collectible item.I highly recommended you go pick up a couple keep one in your car, bathroom and in your purse. Trust me ladies you won't be disappointed..I only with they had a lil sponge on a stick under the cap to it on. I dont using my finger

reviews.headline: I love this lip mask
reviews.comments: Super comfortable to wear an ultra hydrating. This lip mask is perfect for overnight or even during the day. It gives off a subtle tint with great ingredients.

reviews.headline: Smells great!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is such an adorable product that actually feels amazing! I am so obsessed with the packaging, the top is squishy just like it looks. The formula itself is super smooth and easy to apply quickly. It does not feel sticky at all and it definitely keeps my lips very moisturized for a long time before having to reapply. It stays on on night long as well! The scent is super yummy and smells like cotton candy. It is a bit on the expensive side for being such a tiny container, but a little bit goes a long way so this should last a long time. Overall I really liked this product and if you are looking for a lip mask this is the one I would go for! Another popular brand for lip masks is more sticky than this and it is unpleasant, but I don't have that issue with this one. Thank you again for sending it to me to try out!

reviews.headline: Lips feel nice
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] First of all, I love this packaging! Charlotte Tilbury has the best packaging. It's beautiful. From the design down to the colors. The lip mask itself is smooth and glides right on. Leaving my lips smooth and with a nice glow. My lips feel hydrated and smooth as well. Feels nice.

reviews.headline: Lips feel soft and hydrated
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This Charlotte Tilbury lip mask comes in an adorable, cushioned, flip-top container featuring the brand's signature quilted embossing, which exudes a luxuriously soft and velvety appearance. Its compact size makes it exceptionally convenient for carrying in my handbag. The texture is incredibly smooth and feels like a delightful treat on my lips. The consistency resembles a balm that I simply swipe and apply with my fingertips. My dry lips felt instantly hydrated and soft, while the delicate pink tint gave a plump look. It provides a subtle and natural-looking flush of color to my lips, which I find ideal when I want to go for a minimal or natural makeup look. Although it is not transfer-proof, I am easily able to layer this. This is a lovely choice for those seeking a lip treatment that feels indulgent and performs well as a primer and even as an overnight mask, all in a compact format.

reviews.headline: Feathery texture! Nourishes and hydrates!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] My lips tend to get dry , especially during winters! I like to keep my lips hydrated and nourished. I started using the Pillow talk life changing lip mask by Charlotte Tilbury and I am impressed to say the least! The texture is feather light and a small amount goes a long way! Easy to apply and the hydration is quick - almost instant! Lips feel smooth , soft and fuller. I love how it coats the lips without feeling heavy or greasy! I apply it twice or thrice a day and my lips stay hydrated , supple and smooth!  The packaging is extremely pretty and elegant! A perfect present for a bridal shower or any occasion for that matter.  Works wonders for lips and it's a must try!

reviews.headline: Life Changing Lip Mask
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The name says it all. This lip mask is amazing. It's hydrating and has a great texture and scent. The packaging is so cute and high quality. This will be my new go to lip mask.
